      • reset

        public void reset(Deck deck)
        Overriden by the classes that extend this. At the end of the turn every card missing on the table has to be replaced
        Parameters:
        deck - could be "weapon deck" or "ammo deck" based on the type of square

      • setDependency

        public void setDependency(Square[][] board)
        It will set what there are around the square.
        Parameters:

      • getCoordinates

        public int[] getCoordinates(Square[][] board)
                     throws NotPartOfBoardException
        Parameters:
        board - the actual map that is used
        Returns:
        the coordinates (x,y) in order to know the exact position in the space of the map
        Throws:
        NotPartOfBoardException - it will be thrown only if the square you try to get coordinates are not part of the board
